adjectives.description: unprompted (comparative more unprompted, superlative most unprompted)

entries.meaning: Without being told to say or do something
examples: The unprompted, rapid, and reliable emergence of hierarchical relationships within human social groups (Gruenfeld & Tiedens, 2010; Leavitt, 2005) means that differences in social status exist in perhaps all human social environments (Anderson & Kilduff, 2009; Gould, 2002; Ridgeway, 1991).
